long_description: Head out with the REI Paddler's hat for a day of fun on the water. Wide brim shields eyes from sun and rain; foam insert in the brim keeps hat afloat should it fall off. Polyester mesh panels on the side provide ventilation. Polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Rear toggle fine-tunes the fit of the REI Paddler's hat. Chin strap keeps the hat on your head when the wind picks up.
short_description: Head out with the REI Paddler's hat for a day of fun on the water.
